edu.bpl.pwsplugin.utils

Class PWSLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bpl.pwsplugin.utils.PWSLogger

  • public class PWSLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    This logger is responsible for writing log files. It saves it's own "PWSLog", it also redirects micro-managers CoreLog to be saved in custom locations. A single file will be saved to during a single session of Micro-Manager. A copy of the log file will also be saved to the acquisition directory when an acquisition is being run.
    Author:
    Nick Anthony (nickmanthony@hotmail.com)
